item.description:
Activity Description / Brunch price and 2 hour Cruise $35.00 "Its A Steal"
Enjoy brunch in a new unique way. Experience the savory flavors provided by The Greek Olive Restaurant while taking in the delightful views of New Haven Harbor.

Our brunch Includes:


Coffee

Juice
Bagels
Muffins
Danish
Croissants
Egg Sandwiches
Burritos
Fruit
Quiche

Some of the sites you'll see are:

Historical Fort Nathan Hale - this fort played a role in the American Revolution, the War of 1812 and the Civil War, and was the first site in New Haven to be recognized as a Landmark and Historic site.

Picturesque Lighthouse Point - the lighthouse is also known as the Five Mile Point Light as it sits on a point of land five miles from the center of New Haven.
An incredible view of Long Island Sound - the Sound features a diversity of plant and animal life and was designated a National Estuary in 1987.
Work up your appetite by helping raise sail or just sit back and relax while you enjoy your coffee.

You'll come for the food, you'll stay for the experience.


What Is Not Included?
Alcohol is not served on board. If you enjoy a Mimosa or Bloody Mary with your brunch, you are more than welcome to bring your own.

Gratuity is not included in the price of your sail.


Meeting Location:
Long Wharf Pier (New Haven, CT)
(Exact meeting location details will be provided immediately upon purchase of tickets.)

Lets get together and bring our own Mimosa for the Cruise :-) Go on line to purchase tickets http://www.zerve.com/...

group.name: New Haven Wine and Dining Meetup Group,

item.name: Sunday Brunch " Harbor Cruise"
